about.description:
The Open MPI Project is an open source Message Passing Interface
implementation that is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic,
research, and industry partners.
about.summary: An open source Message Passing Interface implementation.

name: openmpi
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.25.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: openmpi
  version: 4.1.6
source:
  fn: openmpi-4.1.6.tar.bz2
  sha256: f740994485516deb63b5311af122c265179f5328a0d857a567b85db00b11e415
  url: https://www.open-mpi.org/software/ompi/v4.1/downloads/openmpi-4.1.6.tar.bz2
build:
  ignore_run_exports:
    - ucx
  number: 100
  run_exports:
    - openmpi >=4.1.6,<5.0a0
  script_env:
    - CUDA_HOME
  string: h336e698_100
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - autoconf 2.71 pl5321h2b4cb7a_1
    - automake 1.16.5 pl5321ha770c72_0
    - binutils_impl_linux-64 2.40 hf600244_0
    - binutils_linux-64 2.40 hbdbef99_2
    - gcc_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 he2b93b0_2
    - gcc_linux-64 12.3.0 h76fc315_2
    - gfortran_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 hfcedea8_2
    - gfortran_linux-64 12.3.0 h7fe76b4_2
    - gxx_impl_linux-64 12.3.0 he2b93b0_2
    - gxx_linux-64 12.3.0 h8a814eb_2
    - kernel-headers_linux-64 2.6.32 he073ed8_16
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.40 h41732ed_0
    - libgcc-devel_linux-64 12.3.0 h8bca6fd_2
    - libgcc-ng 13.2.0 h807b86a_2
    - libgfortran5 13.2.0 ha4646dd_2
    - libgomp 13.2.0 h807b86a_2
    - libsanitizer 12.3.0 h0f45ef3_2
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-64 12.3.0 h8bca6fd_2
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.2.0 h7e041cc_2
    - libtool 2.4.7 h27087fc_0
    - m4 1.4.18 h516909a_1001
    - make 4.3 hd18ef5c_1
    - perl 5.26.2 h36c2ea0_1008
    - sysroot_linux-64 2.12 he073ed8_16
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - libgcc-ng 13.2.0 h807b86a_2
    - libgfortran-ng 13.2.0 h69a702a_2
    - libgfortran5 13.2.0 ha4646dd_2
    - libgomp 13.2.0 h807b86a_2
    - libnuma 2.0.16 h0b41bf4_1
    - libstdcxx-ng 13.2.0 h7e041cc_2
    - libzlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5
    - ucx 1.14.0 h3484d09_2
    - ucx-proc 1.0.0 gpu
    - zlib 1.2.13 hd590300_5
  run:
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - libgfortran-ng
    - libgfortran5 >=12.3.0
    - libstdcxx-ng >=12
    - libzlib >=1.2.13,<1.3.0a0
    - mpi 1.0 openmpi
    - zlib
  run_constrained:
    - cudatoolkit  >= 10.2
    - ucx >=1.14.0,<2.0a0
test:
  files:
    - mpiexec.sh
    - tests/helloworld.sh
  script: run_test.sh
about:
  description: 'The Open MPI Project is an open source Message Passing Interface

    implementation that is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic,

    research, and industry partners.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/open-mpi/ompi
  doc_url: https://www.open-mpi.org/doc/
  home: https://www.open-mpi.org/
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An open source Message Passing Interface implementation.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - astrofrog
    - beckermr
    - bekozi
    - dalcinl
    - leofang
    - minrk
    - msarahan
    - ocefpaf
